welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Almoradi, a charming city known for its beautiful landscapes and warm Mediterranean climate. We invite you to immerse yourself in our culture and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Alicante El Altet Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used mainly for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at San Javier Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for seasonal and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Corvera International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Corvera International Airport, primarily used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
